TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeflateStream extends System.IO.Stream

summary.span: Provides methods and properties for compressing and decompressing streams by using the Deflate algorithm.

span.span: Provides methods and properties for compressing and decompressing streams by using the Deflate algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示 Deflate 算法，它是一种用于无损文件压缩和解压缩的行业标准算法。This class represents the Deflate algorithm, which is an industry-standard algorithm for lossless file compression and decompression. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始， 类使用 zlib 库。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class uses the zlib library. 因此，它提供了更好的压缩算法，在大多数情况下，它比在早期版本的 .NET Framework 中提供的压缩文件更小。As a result, it provides a better compression algorithm and, in most cases, a smaller compressed file than it provides in earlier versions of the .NET Framework. 此类本质上不提供将文件添加到 zip 存档或从 zip 存档中提取文件的功能。This class does not inherently provide functionality for adding files to or extracting files from zip archives. 若要使用 zip 存档，请使用 和 类。To work with zip archives, use the and the classes. 类使用与 类使用的 gzip 数据格式相同的压缩算法。The class uses the same compression algorithm as the gzip data format used by the class. 和 中的压缩功能作为流公开。The compression functionality in and is exposed as a stream. 数据逐字节读取，因此不能执行多个传递来确定压缩整个文件或大型数据块的最佳方法。Data is read on a byte-by-byte basis, so it is not possible to perform multiple passes to determine the best method for compressing entire files or large blocks of data. 和 类最适用于未压缩的数据源。The and classes are best used on uncompressed sources of data. 如果源数据已压缩，使用这些类实际上可能会增加流的大小。If the source data is already compressed, using these classes may actually increase the size of the stream. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类压缩和解压缩文件的目录。The following example shows how to use the class to compress and decompress a directory of files. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/CS/deflatetest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/VB/deflatetest.vb#1)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类压缩大于 4 GB 的文件将导致异常。Using the class to compress a file larger than 4 GB will cause an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您想要指定压缩效率或速度对于 类的实例是否更重要时，可以使用此构造函数。You use this constructor when you want to specify whether compression efficiency or speed is more important for an instance of the class. 此构造函数重载使用压缩模式 。This constructor overload uses the compression mode . 若要将压缩模式设置为另一个值，请使用 或 重载。To set the compression mode to another value, use the or overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在创建 对象时设置压缩级别。The following example shows how to set the compression level when creating a object. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/vb/program1.vb#1)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified stream and compression mode.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified stream and compression mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 拥有基础流，因此关闭流也会关闭基础流。By default, owns the underlying stream, so closing the stream also closes the underlying stream. 请注意，基础流的状态可能会影响流的可用性。Note that the state of the underlying stream can affect the usability of the stream. 此外，不执行显式检查，因此在创建新实例时不会引发其他异常。Also, no explicit checks are performed, so no additional exceptions are thrown when the new instance is created. 如果创建的 类的实例的 `mode` 参数等于 `Compress`，则会立即插入标头信息。If an instance of the class is created with the `mode` parameter equal to `Compress`, header information is inserted immediately. 如果没有进一步的操作，流将显示为有效的、空的压缩文件。If no further action occurs, the stream appears as a valid, empty, compressed file. 使用 类压缩大于 4 GB 的文件会引发异常。Using the class to compress a file larger than 4 GB raises an exception. 默认情况下，在 压缩模式时，压缩级别设置为 。By default, the compression level is set to when the compression mode is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类压缩和解压缩文件。The following example shows how to use the class to compress and decompress a file. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/CS/deflatetest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/VB/deflatetest.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定压缩效率或速度对于 类的实例是否更重要，以及在释放 对象后是否将流对象保持打开状态，请使用此构造函数。You use this constructor when you want to specify whether compression efficiency or speed is more important for an instance of the class, and whether to leave the stream object open after disposing the object. 此构造函数重载使用压缩模式 。This constructor overload uses the compression mode . 若要将压缩模式设置为另一个值，请使用 或 重载。To set the compression mode to another value, use the or overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在创建 对象时设置压缩级别，以及如何使流保持打开状态。The following example shows how to set the compression level when creating a object and how to leave the stream open. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/vb/program2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，你可以通过使用 方法执行异步读取操作。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous read operations by using the method. 方法仍在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 中可用以支持旧版代码;不过，您可以使用新的异步方法更轻松地实现异步 i/o 操作。The method is still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步文件 I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous File I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md). 将 返回值传递到流的 方法，以确定读取的字节数，以及释放用于读取的操作系统资源。Pass the return value to the method of the stream to determine how many bytes were read and to release operating system resources used for reading. 为此，可以使用 调用的相同代码，也可以在传递给 的回调中执行此操作。You can do this either by using the same code that called or in a callback passed to . 发出异步读取或写入操作时，将更新流中的当前位置，而不是在 i/o 操作完成时进行更新。The current position in the stream is updated when the asynchronous read or write operation is issued, not when the I/O operation completes. 多个同时进行的异步请求会导致不确定请求完成顺序。Multiple simultaneous asynchronous requests render the request completion order uncertain. 使用 属性来确定当前 对象是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current object supports reading. 如果流已关闭或传递的参数无效，则会立即从 引发异常。If a stream is closed or you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately from . 在异步读取请求期间发生的错误（例如，i/o 请求过程中的磁盘故障）会在线程池线程上发生，并在调用 时引发异常。Errors that occur during an asynchronous read request, such as a disk failure during the I/O request, occur on the thread pool thread and throw exceptions when calling .

exception.span: The method tried to read asynchronously past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurred.

span.span: The method tried to read asynchronously past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurred.

exception.span: One or more of the arguments is invalid.

span.span: One or more of the arguments is invalid.

exception.span: Methods were called after the stream was closed.

span.span: Methods were called after the stream was closed.

exception.span: The current implementation does not support the read operation.

span.span: The current implementation does not support the read operation.
This call cannot be completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，可以通过使用 方法执行异步写入操作。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous write operations by using the method. 方法仍在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 中可用以支持旧版代码;不过，您可以使用新的异步方法更轻松地实现异步 i/o 操作。The method is still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步文件 I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous File I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md). 将当前方法返回的 对象传递到 ，以确保写入完成并适当地释放资源。Pass the object returned by the current method to to ensure that the write completes and frees resources appropriately. 为此，可以使用 调用的相同代码，也可以在传递给 的回调中执行此操作。You can do this either by using the same code that called or in a callback passed to . 如果在异步写入操作过程中发生错误，则在使用此方法返回的 调用 之前，将不会引发异常。If an error occurs during an asynchronous write operation, an exception will not be thrown until is called with the returned by this method. 如果流可写，则在流的末尾写入会扩展流。If a stream is writable, writing at the end of the stream expands the stream. 发出异步读取或写入操作时，将更新流中的当前位置，而不是在 i/o 操作完成时进行更新。The current position in the stream is updated when you issue the asynchronous read or write operation, not when the I/O operation completes. 多个同时进行的异步请求会导致不确定请求完成顺序。Multiple simultaneous asynchronous requests render the request completion order uncertain. 使用 属性来确定当前 对象是否支持写入。Use the property to determine whether the current object supports writing. 如果流已关闭或传递的参数无效，则会立即从 引发异常。If a stream is closed or you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately from . 在异步写入请求期间发生的错误（例如，i/o 请求过程中的磁盘故障）会在线程池线程上发生，并在调用 时引发异常。Errors that occur during an asynchronous write request, such as a disk failure during the I/O request, occur on the thread pool thread and throw exceptions when calling .

span.span: The method tried to write asynchronously past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 复制从当前 Deflate 流中的当前位置开始，复制操作完成后，不会重置目标流的位置。Copying begins at the current position in the current Deflate stream and does not reset the position of the destination stream after the copy operation is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 `CopyToAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `CopyToAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 属性的 值。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property. 复制从当前 Deflate 流中的当前位置开始。Copying begins at the current position in the current Deflate stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public method and the method. 调用受保护的 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `DisposeAsync` 方法，您可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的释放操作。The `DisposeAsync` method enables you to perform a resource-intensive dispose operation without blocking the main thread. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 此方法通过将任何更改写入后备存储并关闭流以释放资源来释放 Deflate 流。This method disposes the Deflate stream by writing any changes to the backing store and closing the stream to release resources. 调用 `DisposeAsync` 允许出于其他目的重新分配 所使用的资源。Calling `DisposeAsync` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，你可以通过使用 方法执行异步读取操作。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous read operations by using the method. 方法仍在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 中可用以支持旧版代码;不过，您可以使用新的异步方法更轻松地实现异步 i/o 操作。The method is still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步文件 I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous File I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md). 调用此方法以确定从流中读取的字节数。Call this method to determine how many bytes were read from the stream. 可以调用此方法一次，以返回对 和 的调用之间的读取字节量。This method can be called once to return the amount of bytes read between calls to and . 此方法将一直阻塞，直到 I/O 操作已完成。This method blocks until the I/O operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，可以通过使用 方法执行异步写入操作。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous write operations by using the method. 方法仍在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 中可用以支持旧版代码;不过，您可以使用新的异步方法更轻松地实现异步 i/o 操作。The method is still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步文件 I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous File I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md). 对于每次调用 方法，只需调用一次 。 must be called only once for every call to the method. 此方法将一直阻塞，直到 I/O 操作已完成。This method blocks until the I/O operation has completed. 在异步写入请求期间发生的错误（例如，i/o 请求过程中的磁盘故障）将在线程池线程上发生，并在调用 时变为可见。Errors that occur during an asynchronous write request, such as a disk failure during the I/O request, occur on the thread pool thread and become visible upon a call to . 调用 时，线程池线程引发的异常将不可见。Exceptions thrown by the thread pool thread will not be visible when calling .

summary.span: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current Deflate stream into a byte span and advances the position within the Deflate stream by the number of bytes read.

span.span: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current Deflate stream into a byte span and advances the position within the Deflate stream by the number of bytes read.

returns.span: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.

span.span: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: This can be less than the number of bytes allocated in the buffer if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

span.span: This can be less than the number of bytes allocated in the buffer if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading. 使用 方法从当前流中异步读取。Use the method to read asynchronously from the current stream. 此方法从当前流中读取最多 `buffer.Length` 个字节，并将它们存储在 `buffer`中。This method read a maximum of `buffer.Length` bytes from the current stream and store them in `buffer`. Deflate 流中的当前位置由读取的字节数提前，但是，如果发生异常，则 Deflate 流中的当前位置将保持不变。The current position within the Deflate stream is advanced by the number of bytes read; however, if an exception occurs, the current position within the Deflate stream remains unchanged. 如果没有数据可用，则此方法将被阻止，直到至少有一个字节的数据可供读取。This method will block until at least one byte of data can be read, in the event that no data is available. 仅当流中没有更多的数据，并且不需要更多的数据时（例如闭合套接字或文件尾），`Read` 才返回0。`Read` returns 0 only when there is no more data in the stream and no more is expected (such as a closed socket or end of file). 即使尚未到达流的末尾，方法也可以随意返回比所请求的字节更少的字节。The method is free to return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached. 使用 读取基元数据类型。Use for reading primitive data types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 `ReadAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `ReadAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 属性的 值。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

summary.span: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current Deflate stream, writes them to a byte array, advances the position within the Deflate stream by the number of bytes read, and monitors cancellation requests.

span.span: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current Deflate stream, writes them to a byte array, advances the position within the Deflate stream by the number of bytes read, and monitors cancellation requests.

returns.span: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation, which wraps the total number of bytes read into the .

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation, which wraps the total number of bytes read into the .

returns.span: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the Deflate stream has been reached.

span.span: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the Deflate stream has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 `ReadAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `ReadAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 属性的 值。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持写入。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing. 使用 方法异步写入当前流。Use the method to write asynchronously to the current stream. 如果写入操作成功，Deflate 流中的位置将按写入的字节数向前移动。If the write operation is successful, the position within the Deflate stream advances by the number of bytes written. 如果发生异常，则 Deflate 流中的位置将保持不变。If an exception occurs, the position within the Deflate stream remains unchanged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 `WriteAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `WriteAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持写入。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 属性的 值。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.
